title: Question:
author: rakib9855
content: Well its a Limited supply and its a Good long Term Investment 2-3 years If You are patient enough it Will be well rewarded. But in this time no way you watch the news!No matter how many times You see corrections but You dont sell it.

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: "Singnature"Is that's the correct name for the project that you're telling us that will be a good place for our money for long term?And as you say long term, it's not just going to be around 2-3 years because that's more than that. But if that's definition of your long term, then that's fine. While with the name of the project you've left, I don't understand if that's the real name or you made a typo because I can't find that project in cmc.
